knimeNode.name: Filename Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a new file name as flow variable

fullDescription.intro: This node takes a base directory path, a file name, and a file extension to create a new file path. The inputs can be in a form of flow variables, but not necessarily so. The output is a flow variable.
fullDescription.option: Specify the base directory where the file will be located.
Specify the name of the file. Some special characters, such as /, \, ?, *, :, <, >, ", | will be rejected.
Specify the extension of the file. The dot (.) can be included, but not necessary.

ports.outPort: Output variable containing the new file name.
